contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Italian comune | name = Zumpano | official_name = Comune di Zumpano | native_name = | image_skyline = | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_shield = Zumpano-Stemma.png | shield_alt = | image_map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | latd = 39 |latm = 19 |lats = |latNS = N | longd = 16 |longm = 18 |longs = |longEW = E | coordinates_type = region:IT | coordinates_display = title | coordinates_footnotes = | region = {{RegioneIT|sigla=CAL}} | province = {{ProvinciaIT (short form)|sigla=CS}} (CS) | frazioni = | mayor_party = | mayor = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 8 | population_footnotes = <ref name="istat">All demographics and other statistics from the Italian statistical institute ([[National Institute of Statistics (Italy)|Istat]])</ref> | population_total = 2053 | population_as_of = 2007 | pop_density_footnotes = | population_demonym = Zumpanesi | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_min_m = | elevation_max_m = | elevation_m = 429 | twin1 = | twin1_country = | saint = [[Saint George|San Giorgio]] | day = 23 April | postal_code = 87040 | area_code = 0984 | website = {{official|http://www.comune.zumpano.cs.it/}} | footnotes = <!-- These are currently unused --> | istat = 078155 | fractions = [[Cosenza]], [[Lappano]], [[Rende]], [[Rovito]], [[San Pietro in Guarano]] | fiscal_code = M202 }} '''Zumpano''' is a town and ''[[comune]]'' in the province of [[Cosenza]] in the [[Calabria]] region of southern [[Italy]]. [[File:Chiesa di San Giorgio a Zumpano.jpg|thumb|left|[[Saint George]]'s church, Zumpano]] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Calabria-geo-stub}} {{Province of Cosenza}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Calabria]]
